pullRequest.body:
Also MulEquivs that add or remove WithZero on both sides 
And some basic WithOne/WithZero API


---

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

If you are moving or deleting declarations, please include these lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Moves:
- Vector.* -> Mathlib.Vector.*
- ...

Deletions:
- Nat.bit1_add_bit1
- ...

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

```suggestion
lemma recOneCoe_one {C : WithOne Î± â†’ Sort*} (hâ‚ hâ‚‚) :
```
to signify that those hypotheses will usually be found by unification
Can you make the name better match the existing `WithZero.unitsWithZeroEquiv`? Also `G` should be implicit

```suggestion
noncomputable def _root_.MulEquiv.withZero [Group Î²] (e : Î± â‰ƒ* Î²) :
```

```suggestion
noncomputable def _root_.MulEquiv.unzero [Group Î²] (e : WithZero Î± â‰ƒ* WithZero Î²) :
```

```suggestion
    suffices ((unzero A : Î²) : WithZero Î²) = unzero B * unzero C by
```

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat(Algebra/GroupWithZero): MulEquiv between WithZero (units) and the base group with zero
